tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Lakshmi Menon is very friendly and takes time to listen to your problems. The waiting time was reasonable, even when we were late for the appointment due to unforeseen traffic. And she was patient enough to listen to all our queries and provided all answers in a calm and constructive manner. It was a huge improvement from some of our previous doctors, who would give very blunt and careless remarks about our baby, which no parent would like to listen.

All in all, a great doctor who takes care of your little one with a smile always.

tags: None
review: She tries to understand the complete child health history in her first few questions and later listens to the health issue.  She doesn't suggest antibiotics in the first go,  which is good for children.  Second thoughts not required in consulting her*  *** ** *** ****** *************

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: We simply adore n love the doctor. She is my daughters doctor since birth.  It's been 4 years. She is very courteous, sweet n to the point.  My daughter loves her too.  Anyone looking for pedeatrician can go to her without any hesitation.  Your bundle of joy will b in safe hands.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
She first understood the whole history of my child.
She probed a lot about my child like where she was born was all her vacation done etc and then asked about the current problem and suggested relevant treatment and also explained why these medicine are give and told about the plan of action. These little things gave a lot of confidence.

tags: None
review: Dr. Lakshmi Menon is quite friendly and easy to talk with. She takes time to understand the kid's history and patiently listens to parents before getting into a conclusion. We consulted her first for our daughter's eczema and thereafter she has been our kid's regular pediatrician. The support and care she gives is exemplary and doesn't give medicines or antibiotics if not required. Everytime we meet her she has the same positive energy which gives great peace of mind to us.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
**** ** ******* ***** ** *** ** *** **** ******************** 
Unlike most of the Doctors she never keeps her patients waiting unless there is an emergency. 
She listens , answers questions,  and is always compassionate.
The best part never prescribes unnecessary medicines and antibiotics.
Simply phenomenal!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I have been consulting Dr Lakshmi since the time my daughter was born. For both vaccination and consultations. And she has been patient with both my child and me. Answering all my queries and giving me practical advice on how to manage my child's illness and what to expect etc . *** ********* *** **** ********* ******* 
And it's so refreshing to see a doctor keep up the same energy levels for each and every consultation  and always greet you with a bright smile.

I have recommended Dr. Lakshmi Menon to my family & friend for their kids and would recommend others as well.. Thanks

review: pathetic experience. Dr.lakshmi was so rude and not having patience to listen to the problem statement. Right from beginningshe was speaking in a higher tone and felt like talking my mother in-law. Huge generation gap.. I was about to highlight about my sons  issue to her. In one sentence she made me stop that other dermat is looking at it. Thought as she is elderly person she would have that empathy to towards the patients.Most of all as a doctor she haven't spoken a single word to my 4 year old son to see check his mental growth.*** **** *** * ******* ******** **** ********** *** **** * ** ** *****

tags: None
review:
*** ** *** **** ******* Whenever I have approached her with my kid's I'll health she greeted her with a smile and explained the causes and remedy for the ill health in such a nice way that I have come out of panic and tension. The medicines she recommends *** ******* *** cured my kid's after the  course is over. In one word she is excellent.

A special mention about the way she communicates with the child whenever I have visited her especially for vaccination. She would consoled my yelling child whenever she gives shots in a call and patient manner. I have visited other child specialists bit no one like her who would console and communicate with the child while checking the child during the illness.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I have been visiting Dr Lakshmi Menon for past seven years. Started with my elder daughter and now my second one too. She has always been very nice and I trust her judgement completely.  
Once my elder daughter was having very high fever n there was some suspicion about dengue. We went to a local lab for blood test and the report suggested that my daughter had malaria. We panicked n rushed to Dr Lakshmi.  But she totally disagreed with the report. We did the test again on her insistence in cloudnine n were relieved to know that nothing was wrong. It was her judgement that saved our daughter from unnecessary medicines n trouble.
For both my kids she is the Doctor I trust n rush to. Thank you Dr Lakshmi Menon.

tags: None
review:
Dr. Lakshmi Menon is very easy to talk. Also she does not recommend high dosages nor antibiotics unnecessarily. She explains everything clearly. Earlier we used to visit her in Jayanagar cloudnine. But now she is also available at Bellandur Cloudnine which has been very comfortable for us as it near by.
I recommend her very much.

tags: None
review:
Lakshmy Menon is my son's pediatrician from almost 3 years now. We were very conscious as my son was born in US and shifted to India when he about 3 years, thankfully she never made us regret our choice!

Very soft and friendly with kids and she was very well able to relate to and understand the vaccination and medication he was used to there in US.

Overall, we are happy and recommend her with full heart.
